that he went to a "radical Madrasas has been debunked, from the CNN article: '''Obama has noted in his two books that he spent two years in a Muslim school'''
no, this has been debunked. it was a public secular school. most of the attendees happened to be muslim as it was indonesia. but it was not a "islamic school". http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/16813267/
a school can be "Islamic" without being a [[madrassa]], I quoted this strait from the article.
